Package com.jgefroh.core

The essential classes and interfaces of the Core framework.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IComponent The interface for a Component.
ICore The interface for the Core.
IEntity The interface for an Entity.
IInfoPack Interface for an InfoPack.
IInfoPackFactory Interface for the InfoPackFactory.
ISystem The interface for a System.
 

Class Summary
Core An implementation of the ICore interface.
Entity A default implementation of the IEntity interface.
LoggerFactory Provides an easy way to create an instance-specific logger for debugging.
System This is an abstract implementation of a System.

The essential classes and interfaces of the Core framework.
